entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13.
